page.title: 06SCHOOLS 2 (Middle)
page.content: {ROBERT KETT MIDDLE SCHOOL}is a busy place with 405 pupils, 14 classes and 20 staff not counting the cleaners and the dinner ladies.{Mr.Kelly}is the headmaster but he is retiring at Christmas. We have 4 houses Danes, Normans, Angles and Saxons. We split into these houses normally for games. School starts at 9.00 a.m. and ends at 3.00 p.m. There are a lot of clubs we can attend after school,but some of these have stopped because of the teacher's dispute. We can go home for dinner, have a packed lunch or school lunch from our good cafeteria.We can buy biscuits and drink at break.Our uniform is grey but is optional. Despite the fall in pupil numbers, subjects studied still include R.E, English,Maths,Social Studies,French, Music,Science,Technology,Homecraft, Art/Craft,Drama and Sports.
